comment: The updated tennis court at 789 Sports Ave is fantastic! The synthetic surface feels great, and the location is very convenient. Definitely worth the price!
Really enjoyed playing here. The court is in great condition, and the booking process was smooth. The only downside is that parking can be a bit tricky during peak hours.
This is my go-to court now. The synthetic surface is top-notch, and itâ€™s always well-maintained. I love how easy it is to book a slot online.
